tha-ap176:0.3_0: down to the profit, the senior by stomach.
tha-ap176:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap176:2.4_0: This fruit of well will be made.
tha-ap176:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap176:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Udaya.
tha-ap176:5.1_0: fourth roaming by the senior, the senior monks of the stomach.
